description: Physicists revealed a microscopic phenomenon that could greatly improve the performance of soft devices, such as agile flexible robots or microscopic capsules for drug delivery.
title: Physicists propose path to faster, more flexible robots

description: A new commentary paper puts forth a transformative solution to the unsustainable reliance on fossil resources by the chemical industry: catalysis to leverage sustainable waste resources, ushering the industry from a linear to a circular economy.
title: Can we revolutionize the chemical industry and create a circular economy? Yes, with the help of catalysts

description: Using DNA origami, researchers have built a diamond lattice with a periodicity of hundreds of nanometers -- a new approach for manufacturing semiconductors for visible light.
title: Diamond glitter: A play of colors with artificial DNA crystals

description: The spiny legged 308-million-year-old arachnid Douglassarachne acanthopoda was discovered the famous Mazon Creek locality.
title: Ancient arachnid from coal forests of America stands out for its spiny legs

description: People who use metformin are less likely to develop a myeloproliferative neoplasm (MPN) over time, indicating that the treatment may help prevent the development of certain types of cancers, according to a new study.
title: Anti-diabetic treatment associated with reduced risk of developing blood cancer

description: An HIV vaccine candidate triggered low levels of an elusive type of broadly neutralizing HIV antibodies among a small group of people enrolled in a 2019 clinical trial.
title: A trial HIV vaccine triggered elusive and essential antibodies in humans
